name: pm5.71
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wi(w0, wn(w1)), wb(wa(wo(w2, w0), w1), wa(w2, w1)))

stmt.origin: ja(w0, wn(w1), wb(wa(wo(w2, w0), w1), wa(w2, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, wn(w1)), wb(wa(wo(w2, w0), w1), wa(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wn(w0), wb(wa(wo(w2, w0), w1), wa(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wn(w1), wb(wa(wo(w2, w0), w1), wa(w2, w1)))

-| wi(wn(w1), wb(wa(wo(w2, w0), w1), wa(w2, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(w0), wb(wa(wo(w2, w0), w1), wa(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wn(w0), wb(wo(w2, w0), w2))

|- wi(wi(w0, wn(w1)), wb(wa(wo(w2, w0), w1), wa(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wn(w1), wb(wa(wo(w2, w0), w1), wa(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wn(w0), wb(wo(w2, w0), w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(w0), wb(wo(w2, w0), w2))
-| wi(wn(w0), wi(wo(w2, w0), w2))
-| wi(w2, wo(w2, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, wn(w1)), wb(wa(wo(w2, w0), w1), wa(w2, w1)))

-| wi(w2, wo(w2, w0))

-| wi(wn(w1), wi(w1, wb(wo(w2, w0), w2)))

|- wi(wi(w0, wn(w1)), wb(wa(wo(w2, w0), w1), wa(w2, w1)))

comment: Theorem *5.71 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 125. (Contributed by Roy F. Longton, 23-Jun-2005.)
